title: Review: Bellroy’s leather Pixel 6 case is one of the best, but all I really want is some patina
content:
While I think we all wish we could live in a world without smartphone cases, they’re a necessary thing for many. In my review of the Pixel 6 Pro, I said the phone was so slick it demanded a case. Recently, I picked up Bellroy’s leather case for my Pixel 6 Pro, and while I’ve been happy with it, it’s just short of being truly great.

more…

The post Review: Bellroy’s leather Pixel 6 case is one of the best, but all I really want is some patina appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: There aren't a lot of leather cases for Google's Pixel 6 series, but Bellroy offers one of the few with great quality, and just one flaw.
